data.name: Impossible Simplified Cube
data.detailed_description:
About The Game:

8 Level Parkour Game Join The Fun And See If You Can Beat The Game Every Jump You Make The Closer You Get To The End Of The Game. Challenge Your Self And Avoid All The Obstacles That You Will Be Face With Try Not Hitting The Wall Or It’s Over The Restart Has Its Own Boundaries don’t let them fool you.
——————————————————————————————————————————-———————————————————————————————————————
What To Expect ;
Every Level Is Different With It’s Own Unique Music Every Level Get’s Harder The More You Progress Through The Levels The More The Difficulty Will Increase.
—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

Challenge Your Self And Take On The Levels To See If You Can Get To The Finish Line And Complete The Whole Game Or Can You Do It In A Single Run?……
————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————…….———

Features

Singleplayer Only
No Multiplayer
—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

data.short_description: 8 Level Parkour Game Think You Got What It Takes To Reach The End And Complete The Game!.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: dual core 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 115 MB available space

highlighted.name: Oh Man Here We Go Again!!
Must Be A Glitch In The Matrix
